name: Cyber Drak-Cool-Yas From Mars: Rat and Bat. Love and Hate.
name_original: Cyber Drak-Cool-Yas From Mars: Rat and Bat. Love and Hate.
description:
'Cyber Drak-Cool-Yas From Mars: Rat and Bat. Love and Hate.' is a short visual novel about Trixie Glimmer Smith, a rat on a quest to avoid writing her coursework report writing some thrilling self insert fanfiction set in the world of her favourite cartoon 'Cyber Drak-Cool-Yas from Mars'!

Romance! Action! Morals! It has it all!

If you enjoy Trixies fanfiction, check her out in her full length VN https://digital-poppy.itch.io/trixie !

Content Warning:

Mild lewd
